subtitle.en: Learn more about how Branch works and how it can help you.
Earn monthly recurring commissions for each referral.
Get access to unlimited booking call for advisory services

direction.en: Need direction for the project and your team

prioritizeRequests.en: We help to prioritize what requests have more value for your business

content.en:
Here a example of how it works: 
You start your Monthly membership at May 1st. 
You pause at May 16th. 
At June 1st we'll not billing you. 
If you resume your Monthly subscribtion at September 18th. 
Your nexy billing will be at October 1st.

summary.en: Why wouldn't I just hire a fulltime software engineer?

content.en:
You could, in but the reality it's difficult to hire a fulltime senior-level software engineer. Actually, to entry salaries exceed $110 000, plus beneficts. The process for hiring one is long and costly. It cost thosands of dollars for just hiring process. 

Sometimes it's more valuable to spend your time on your business and let us handle the technology.
Once you have your membership, you can submit as many requests on our queue as you want. And we'll be delivery one by one. First in first out.

summary.en: How fast I will receive my request

content.en:
On average, you'll receive your request in next few days for smaller scope of work: bug fix. For bigger scope of work. like a new feature, it can take up to 2 weeks. For new kickoff project, it can take up to weeks to months depending the complexity of the project. If the scope of work is too big, we'll split it in smaller scope of work for delivery faster where you can review and give feedback. 

If the complexity is kickoff for a project and a advisory, we recommand using the addon for unlimited call. We'll be able to help you to define the next actions for your goal outcome. 

If we can't commit to your project, we'll let you know and we'll refund you.

summary.en: Who is the principal Software engineer?

content.en: ZBRANCH is actually a studio of one person. The founder, myself, will work directly with you. For bigger ou more complex request, like custom backend or particular tech expertise with senior level engineer, I'll work with our network of senior level engineer or third parties provider like AWS.

For frontend, we use SvelteKit/Skeleton/Tailwind. For backend, we use Supabase or SurrealDB. For the infrastructure deploying we can deploy on AWS, Vercel, Netlify or Cloudflare or custom deployment with Kubernetes. 

If you already a custom stack like react or vue or any language like PHP, Python, Ruby. We can work with your stack.

summary.en: What if I don't like the service?

content.en: We provide a high quality of service, there will be no refunds issued. You may cancel your membership on the portal.

subtitle.en: We offer technical direction without the full commitment
